name: ArtifactoryPublishBuildInfo
description: This task publishes the Build Info collected in previous tasks.
author: JFrog

inputs.name: artifactoryService
inputs.label: Artifactory service
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifactory service used for publishing the build info.

inputs.name: excludeEnvVars
inputs.label: Exclude environment variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of case insensitive patterns in the form of value1;value2;.... Environment variables match those patterns will be excluded from the published build info.
